# Plotting

**This fourd chapter is some examples on how to plot and play around with the data.**

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(
  data = Statistics_Kumla_20200408,
  mapping = aes(x = ID, y = PFBA)
) +
  geom_point()

```

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = Statistics_Kumla_20200408,
  mapping = aes(x = ID, y = PFBA, color = Group)
) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(
  data = Statistics_Kumla_20200408,
  mapping = aes(x = ID, y = PFBA, color = Group)
) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
